long_description: Sportlegs(R) supplement capsules incorporate natural vitamins and minerals to help reduce muscle pain related to workouts. Sportlegs increases blood lactate levels to prevent your body from releasing lactic acid into the muscles, which prevents fatigue and increases performance. Take 1 capsule per 50 lbs. of body weight 1 hr. before exercise to reduce muscle burn and increase stamina. Continue to use after exercising to prevent muscle fatigue and reduce recovery time. Includes vitamin D (128 IU), calcium (256mg), magnesium (128mg) and lactate (2,437mg). *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Sportlegs(R) supplement capsules incorporate natural vitamins and minerals to help reduce muscle pain related to workouts.
